name: Apocalyp Snow
description:
Game made for LudumDare 46

Apocalyp Snow is a game where you try to save your fire (and yourself) alive from a not that nICE enemy.

To play, choose the cards on the right in order of execution. You must survive the longest you can, while destroying blocks for bonus points.
